pkgmetadata.longdescription: Selecting General Circulation Models for Species Distribution Modeling // Methods to help selecting General Circulation Models (GCMs) in the context of projecting models to future scenarios. It is provided clusterization algorithms, distance and correlation metrics, as well as a tailor-made algorithm to detect the optimum subset of GCMs that recreate the environment of all GCMs as proposed in Esser et al. (2025) doi:10.1111/gcb.70008.
